conversation.content: I've been feeling really anxious lately about work.
I hear that work has been causing you anxiety. Can you tell me more about what specifically is making you feel this way?
There's just so much to do and I feel like I can't keep up.
It sounds like you're feeling overwhelmed by the workload. That must be really stressful for you.
I had a great day today! Everything went well.
That's wonderful to hear! It sounds like you're feeling really positive. What made today special for you?
I finally finished that project I've been working on for months.
Congratulations on completing your project! That's a significant accomplishment. How does it feel to have it done?
I'm not sure how I'm feeling right now.
Sometimes it can be hard to identify our feelings. That's completely normal. Would you like to explore what might be going on?
I guess I've just been feeling disconnected from people.
Feeling disconnected can be really difficult. Can you share more about when you started noticing this feeling?
